titles.title: I Want To Live The Way He Wants Me To Live

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I want to live the way he wants me to live
I want to give until there's just no more to give.
I want to love, love till there's just no more love
I could never, never out-love the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I found out that giving and loving brought pain
And I promised I would never let it happen again
But I found out that loving was well worth the risk
And that even in losing you win.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He showed me that only in dying we live
And He gave when it seemed there was nothing to give
He loved when loving brought heartache and loss
He forgave from an old rugged cross.
